product.name: Optimum Account
product.shortDescription: Over 55? Maintain a R10,000 investment account and enjoy the benefits of fee reductions and the convenience of digital banking.

benefits: Free cash withdrawals at participating retailer point-of-sale devices(1)
Four Nedbank ATM cash withdrawals free
Two branch cash withdrawals (including cheque encashments) free
Free account payments (including debit and stop orders), interaccount transfers and balance enquiries at self-service(2) channels
cash deposits of up to R5 000 a month free at a Nedbank ATMs
Free cheque deposits and cheque service fees

features.name: My Pocket
features.shortDescription: Saving facility on a current account

features.name: Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan
features.shortDescription: The Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan provides cover that will help you to secure a dignified funeral for yourself or your family members. If you choose this option, we'll get in touch with you to finalise the sale.

features.name: eNotes(SMS)
features.shortDescription: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: No funds alert
features.shortDescription: Electronic notifications when you have insufficient funds for an attempted debit order

features.name: Debit Order Switching
features.shortDescription: Debit Order Switching with transactional product

salesHighlights.question: Can I use my card at toll gates?
Can I do online transactions?
salesHighlights.answer: Yes, you can do local and international transactions that use 3D-Secure.

features.name: Affinity Programmes
features.shortDescription: At no cost to you, through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.

features.name: Amex Card
features.shortDescription: Accelerate your Greenbacks rewards with the Amex Card

features.name: Nedbank investment balance
features.shortDescription: Do you have a Nedbank investment with a balance of R10 000 or more?

features.name: Open a Nedbank investment balance
